pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This scenic video presents a time-lapse view from the bow of a large container ship sailing on the open ocean. The sequence captures the dramatic shift in the sky, starting with the soft, colorful light of dusk that transitions into a more uniform, overcast daytime sky. The primary motion is the rapid movement of clouds across the vast expanse, characteristic of a time-lapse.
